currentContext.content: Phase 4 Analysis Complete - Existing: self-healing loop, pattern matching, suggestions, validation, context management. Missing: REPL interface, linter integration, dependency resolver, dependency graph, .contextignore, shadow mode, background tests, .memory.md, hooks system

Implementing Self-Healing Loop (REPL on steroids), Context Engine (Dependency Graph + .contextignore), Shadow Mode (Speculative Executor), and Institutional Memory & Hooks system for komplete-kontrol-cli
